faq.mainHeading: Everything You Need to Know Before Getting Started

q1.question: What services do you offer?
q1.answer: Yes, new mockups are released every month.
q1.answer2: We specialize in developing CRM systems, mobile applications, and custom IT solutions. We also provide database creation, server setup on AWS, and UI/UX design.

q2.question: How long does it take to complete a project?
q2.answer: Yes, timelines vary depending on the project scope.
q2.answer2: Simple projects can take 1–2 weeks, while more complex systems like CRM or mobile apps may take 1–2 months.

q3.question: Can I customize the features of my CRM system or application?
q3.answer: Yes, all features can be tailored to your specific business needs.
q3.answer2: We develop fully custom logic, dashboards, and workflows based on your requirements.

q4.question: Do you provide ongoing support after project completion?
q4.answer: Yes, we offer maintenance and updates after launch.
q4.answer2: This includes bug fixing, performance optimization, and feature upgrades upon request.

q5.question: How much do your services cost?
q5.answer: Yes, prices depend on the complexity of the project.
q5.answer2: Basic websites start from €500, while custom systems like CRMs or apps are estimated individually after a consultation.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.content:
Landbook.com ("Landbook") is a platform that gathers and presents website design inspirations from all around the web to help Creative Professionals explore the latest design trends. Landbook does not own copyright to any website design presented on Landbook.com, nor is it responsible for content that appears within any website posted on Landbook.com. However, Landbook carefully selects websites which appear on the platform.

At Landbook we have a few fundamental principles regarding privacy:
• We don't ask you for personal information unless we truly need it
• We don't share your personal information with anyone except to comply with the law
• We don't store personal information on our servers unless required

Like most website operators, Landbook collects non-personally-identifying information such as browser type, language preference, referring site, and date/time of each visitor request. Landbook's purpose is to better understand how visitors use its website.

Landbook may collect statistics about visitor behavior and may display this information publicly. Landbook discloses potentially personally-identifying information only to employees and contractors who need to know that information.

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.content:
The following terms govern all use of Landbook.com:

1. Your Landbook Account
You are responsible for maintaining your account security. You must not describe content in a misleading or unlawful manner.

2. Responsibility of Contributors
You are entirely responsible for any content you submit. By making content available, you warrant that:
• The content doesn't infringe any third party rights
• Doesn't contain viruses or malware
• Isn't spam or machine-generated
• Isn't obscene or defamatory

3. Intellectual Property
This Agreement doesn't transfer any Landbook or third party intellectual property to you.

4. Changes
Landbook may modify these terms at any time. Your continued use constitutes acceptance.

5. Termination
Landbook may terminate access at any time, with or without cause.

cookie.title: Cookie Policy
cookie.content:
A cookie is a string of information that a website stores on a visitor's computer. Landbook uses cookies to help identify and track visitors, their usage of the website, and their preferences.

Visitors who don't wish to have cookies placed can set browsers to refuse cookies, though some features may not function properly without them.

Privacy Policy Changes:
Landbook may change its Privacy Policy occasionally. Visitors should check this page for changes. Continued use after changes constitutes acceptance.
